#' Query for CFL Play-by_Play information

cfl_pbp_data.Rd

#' Query for CFL Play-by_Play information

cfl_pbp_data(season = NA, game_id = NA, week = NA, team = NA, event_type = NA)

Arguments

season

Required parameter for the football season.
game_id

Specific Game Id
week

Week of the season
team

Request for specific team
event_type

Request specific event type (Preseason, Regular, Grey Cup, etc)

Value

cfl_pbp_data() - A data frame with 35 variables:

game_id : integer.

UUID of game

home_team : character.

Home team abbreviation

away_team : character.

Away abbreviation

season : integer.

Season

week : integer.

Week of season

play_id : integer.

UUID of play

play_sequence : integer.

Play number of game

quarter : integer.

Quarter

play_clock_start : character.

Play clock at snap

play_clock_start_in_secs : integer.

Seconds rem in quarter at snap

field_position_start : character.

Field position start

field_position_end : character.

Field position end

down : integer.

Down

yards_to_go : integer.

Yards for first down

is_in_red_zone : logical.

Is inside 20

team_home_score : integer.

Home score

team_visitor_score : integer.

Away score

play_type_id : integer.

Play Type Id

play_result_type_id : integer.

Result Type Id

play_result_yards : integer.

Result Yards

play_result_points : integer.

Result Points

play_success_id : integer.

Success Id

play_change_of_possession_occurred : logical.

Last play of posession

team_abbreviation : character.

Offense Abbreviation

team_id : integer.

Offensive Team Id

play_summary : character.

Play Summary

distance_to_goal : numeric.

Yards to Goal

seconds_remain_half : numeric.

Seconds rem in half at snap

seconds_remain_game : numeric.

Seconds rem in game at snap

quarterback_id : integer.

Quarterback CFL Player Id

ball_carrier_id : integer.

Ball carrier CFL player Id

primary_defender_id : integer.

Primary defender CFL Player Id

play_result_type_desc : character.

Play Result Type

play_type_desc : character.

Play Type

play_success_desc : character.

Success Description

Examples

if (FALSE) {
cfl_pbp_data(season = 2016, game_id = 2280)
}
